mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT LOC_CODE, LOC_TYPE, LOC_NAME, LOC_ADDR, NVL(AVG_RATE, 0) AS AVG_RATE, PRICE, MAX_PEOPLE, THUMBNAIL_URL FROM (SELECT DISTINCT LOC_CODE, LOC_TYPE, LOC_NAME, LOC_ADDR, NVL(AVG_RATE, 0) AS AVG_RATE, PRICE, MAX_PEOPLE, THUMBNAIL_URL, APPLY_DATE FROM SEARCHVIEW WHERE PRICE IS NOT NULL AND (LOC_TYPE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR LOC_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR LOC_ADDR LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')) WHERE LOC_TYPE LIKE '%'||#{loc_type}||'%' AND PRICE BETWEEN #{start_price} AND #{end_price} AND LOC_ADDR LIKE '%'||#{loc_addr_city}||'%' AND LOC_ADDR LIKE '%'||#{loc_addr_dong}||'%' AND APPLY_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{start_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
